channel.title: [REUPLOADED]Z508 PvP SOURCE [Had over 3000+ downloads 11000+ views]
channel.description:
Okay, source is based on z508, coded by zach I just made few chances
Dl link http://uppit.com/v/BOS12YZ6
Things i added: ::money To get 40m+ Ags! ::rangetank For rangetank gear! ::hybrid For 70+def Hybriding ::strbonus For Maxed Str bonus req. 70 def ::purerange For 1def ranger gear! ::puremelee For 1def Melee gear! ::purehybrid For 1def hybriding! ::zerker For 45 def maxed str bonus! ::obby For obbymauler stuff! ::food For 28 Tunapotato! ::potset1 For 70+def set ::potset2 For 1def Set ::ADMINCOMMANDZ For ::ADMINCOMMANDZ gotta [Fix]! ::onlyforadmin1 For Phats + Some other stuff ::onlyforadmin2 For 3RD age set! ::onlyforadmin3 For Owner Gear + 2147m! ::commands For all commands! ::runes For 100k all runes! ::empty Empyes your inventory! ::lvlids To see all Level ids! -Infinity Experience on ::lvl (lvlid) (xpamount) To lvl up! -And Fixed the compiler BUG -Added some new zone's Adding some Pictures later! -Took ::starter off added ::money! FOR BEGINNERS: If you want to chance commands go to:src/net/com/codeusa/net/packethandler/Commands.java or if u want to chance Log In go to:src/net/com/codeusa/test/TestWorldLoader Press ctrl + F and type "welcome" Chance it what ever you like Then Compile the server then Run GL! CREDITS: 90 % for zach (z508 original) 5% on me for updates 5 % forikwoonineenhuis For fixing the "run.bat" Thank you!
Everything is chanced on owner J and co owner V, btw Basic commands: ::pvp ::normal ::lvl id amount ::item id amount ::sellitem id amount ::starter [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/fac7r4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/993qyd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/28ixixx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/eg7s0j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/21denp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2ykngxl.png[/img] PERFECT MAGIC! MORE PICS coming! http://www.mediafire.com/?yzoe2nz2qty There is client 508 ip-changer! NOT MINE! -Owner-J
SORRY FOR BAD SPELLING!

item.description:
@z508z wrote:

Okay, source is based on z508, coded by zach
I just made few chances

Dl link
http://uppit.com/v/BOS12YZ6

Things i added:
::money To get 40m+ Ags!
::rangetank For rangetank gear!
::hybrid For 70+def Hybriding
::strbonus For Maxed Str bonus req. 70 def
::purerange For 1def ranger gear!
::puremelee For 1def Melee gear!
::purehybrid For 1def hybriding!
::zerker For 45 def maxed str bonus!
::obby For obbymauler stuff!
::food For 28 Tunapotato!
::potset1 For 70+def set
::potset2 For 1def Set
::ADMINCOMMANDZ For ::ADMINCOMMANDZ gotta [Fix]!
::onlyforadmin1 For Phats + Some other stuff
::onlyforadmin2 For 3RD age set!
::onlyforadmin3 For Owner Gear + 2147m!
::commands For all commands!
::runes For 100k all runes!
::empty Empyes your inventory!
::lvlids To see all Level ids!
-Infinity Experience on ::lvl (lvlid) (xpamount) To lvl up!
-And Fixed the compiler BUG
-Added some new zone’s
Adding some Pictures later!
-Took ::starter off added ::money!
FOR BEGINNERS: If you want to chance commands go to:src/net/com/codeusa/net/packethandler/Commands.java
or if u want to chance Log In go to:src/net/com/codeusa/test/TestWorldLoader Press ctrl + F and type “welcome” Chance it what ever you like Then Compile the server then Run GL!
CREDITS: 90 % for zach (z508 original) 5% on me for updates 5 % forikwoonineenhuis For fixing the “run.bat” Thank you!

Everything is chanced on owner J and co owner V, btw
Basic commands:
::pvp
